College_Name: NID Ahmedabad
College_Summary: National Institute of Design (NID), Ahmedabad is an autonomous institution established in the year 1961. NID Ahmedabad is an “Institution of National Importance” by the Act of Parliament. It is approved by UGC and AICTE. The college has been recognized by the Department of Scientific and Industrial Research, Government of India. The National Institute of Design has different campuses located in Ahmedabad, Gandhinagar and Bengaluru. NID Ahmedabad offers 8 undergraduate and 7 postgraduate programmes. Additionally, the college also offers Ph.D. Degree courses. The selection procedure for NID Ahmedabad is based on qualifying marks in the NID Entrance Test (NID DAT). The fashion institute has an active placement cell that organizes the annual Industry Interface. The institute provides all the necessary facilities to the students like, a dining area, guest house, health care facilities, extracurricular activities, etc.

College_Name: UID Ahmedabad
College_Summary: Unitedworld Institute of Design (UID) is a private design institute established in 2012 in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. The institute is affiliated with Karnavati University and offers B.Des (Hons), BFA and B.Sc. at the UG level and M.Des at the PG level in various disciplines like Visual Communication, Animation & Digital Media, Interior & Furniture Design, Product Design, Fashion Design and many more. It also offers Ph.D. in Design. Admission to these courses is offered based on the valid marks obtained by candidates in last year’s qualifying exam and UID Design Aptitude Test. Many national and international companies like Wildcraft, IKEA, FILA, CERA, Flipkart, Reliance Studio, Red Tape, KPMG, etc. are invited to the campus every year for the UID Ahmedabad campus drive. Around 3000 students are enrolled in UID Ahmedabad. It has collaborated with more than 30 universities.

College_Name: Sharda School of Pharmacy, Gandhinagar
College_Summary: Sharda School of Pharmacy was established keeping in mind today's challenging health care environment that provides unique opportunities for the pharmacists. The college strives to provide globally competitive pharmacists who are committed and skilled, and are dedicated to discovery as well as dissemination of knowledge in the field of pharmacy and thereby improves the health and the quality of life of the society. The college uses modern concepts and technology in establishing an all-round excellence in innovative pharmacy education, and also admires and rewards team efforts, and outstanding innovations, thus assorting departmental tasks and prop up awareness to professional as well as personal needs.

College_Name: National Institute of Occupational Health - [NIOH], Ahmedabad
College_Summary: National Institute of Occupational Health [NIOH] is the premier institute, under the aegis of the ICMR under the Department of Health Research, Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Govt. of India. The National Institute of Occupational Health (NIOH), Ahmedabad, was established by the Indian Council of Medical Research, New Delhi. The National Institute of Occupational Health (NIOH) has been established with the objectives of promoting intensive research to evaluate environmental stresses/factors at the workplace, to promote the highest quality of occupational health through fundamental and applied research and to develop control technologies and health programmes through basic and fundamental research and to generate human resources in the field.

Som Lalit Institute of Management Studies - [SLIMS-SLIBM], Ahmedabad
College_Summary:
Som Lalit Institute of Management Studies (SLIMS), Ahmedabad was established in 1996 and is one of the institutes run by the Som- Lalit Education and Research Foundation Trust. Som- Lalit College is a pioneer MBA institute since the year 1996. The institute is affiliated to Gujrat Technological University and is also approved by AICTE. More than 3000 students have passed from the institute in the last 24 years. 
Som Lalit Institute of Management Studies has a robust placement record. The highest package was 10 LPA whereas the minimum package was 4.4 LPA. Moreover, the management instate provides 100% placement assistance to the students. Nestle, Kotak Mahindra Bank, IDBI, Indiabulls, and Standard Chartered Bank were some of the companies that visited during the campus placement at Som Lalit Institute of Management Studies.
SLIBM offers a world-class campus equipped with the latest technologies computer labs and Wi-Fi facilities to the students. The students are encouraged to participate in inter-college and intra-college activities like Business quizzes, Digital Marketing, and Motivational workshops. To provide practical knowledge to the students, the institute arranges Industrial Visits during the 2 years course.

College_Name: Mehsana Urban Institute of Sciences - [MUIS], Mehsana
College_Summary: Mehsana Urban Institute of Biosciences is a medical institute that offers quality education to the students in the field of Biosciences. The vision of the institute is to meet the educational need of the youth in the areas of professional studies and provide state-of-the-art learning opportunities along with inculcation of values of commitment and uprightness. It aims to promote acquisition, possession and application of knowledge in the area of life sciences in order to equip the youth to assume responsibilities for the socio-economic development of the society, state and nation. Mehsana Urban Institute of Biosciences was established with the purpose of enriching the students with fundamental knowledge and technical skills, thus equipping them to meet the challenges of the industry. The institute offers M. Sc. Programme approved by Ganpat University, which is ultimately approved by Education department of state of Gujarat and University Grants Commission. The Institute is running three post graduate programmes viz. M. Sc. in Biotechnology, M. Sc. in Microbiology and M.Sc. in Bioinformatics.

Sigma Institute of Physiotherapy, Vadodara
College_Summary: Sigma Institute of Physiotherapy, Baroda, Gujarat,  was established on 2006 and is recognized by Indian Association of Physiotherapists. This institute is a branch institution of Sigma Group of Institutes which provides technical education and thrives to maintain the global standards of education. The mission of the institution is to help in developing physiotherapy as a dynamic profession by including clinical applications to the students, hence maintaining academic excellence. The college has the vision to impart education in health science field by using the latest technology and teaching method, further helping students to develop their soft skills. This college offers bachelor in physiotherapy for 20 students each year. The curriculum of this institute focuses mainly on clinical and research methodologies to develop skill and knowledge for students for diagnosis, prevention and recovery of the patients.

Vidyasagar Infotech College, Jamnagar
College_Summary: Vidya Sagar Infotech College is running under the trust Bhagini Kalyan Samittee. It is situated in Jamnagar City, State of Gujarat and just 1.8 kms away from Jamnagar Old Railway Station. It is affiliated to Saurashtra University. The college has expert, well qualified and dedicated teaching staff in their field of education. It has all necessary facilities like computer laboratory with LCD projector facility, Library facility with all Necessary text books, medical facility and classroom facility. The institute believes that computer knowledge is essential for every job in this globalization.

The institute is an ISO 9001:2000 organization. The certificate was granted in 1993 for Aptech’s Education Support Services.

College_Summary: B. K. School of Business Management is one of the renowned & oldest business schools in the state of Gujarat. The school was started to meet the regional demand for professional managers. B.K School of Business Management offers MBA, PGDM, Certificate, and Doctoral programs in Management.

Gujarat Institute of Hotel Management, Vadodara
College_Summary: Gujarat Institute of Hotel Management is a premier hotel management institute located in Vadodara, Gujarat. The institute was established in 1994. It offers multiple programs such as Diploma, UG, PG, PG Diploma and Certificate courses in the field of Hotel Management. The institute also has an excellent Training and Placement cell which ensures that the students get recruited by leading Hotels. Admissions to the college are on the basis of merit.

ICFAI Business School
College_Summary: ICFAI Business School, Ahmedabad was established in 1995 as a part of ICFAI Business School. The institute is located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. IBS offers a postgraduate diploma course in management. Candidates are selected on the basis of their performance in the national and institutional entrance exams. Shortlisted candidates have to appear for the Group Discussion round followed by a Personal Interview. It offers facilities like AC classrooms, Auditorium, Cafeteria, Labs and Library. The institution is ranked among the top B-Schools in the country.

SR Luthra Institute of Management - [SRLIM], Surat
College_Summary: Shardarani Rameshchander Luthra Institute of Management (SRLIM) is an institute managed by Sarvajanik Education Society and was established with a mission to improve the quality of education in South Gujarat region. The Institute produces people with efficient managerial skills. The Institution specializes in full time 2 year MBA program. The institute focuses on Institute-Industry interaction by undertaking training programs, workshops, and projects. This promising college is very well-aware of the upcoming challenges in the future industry and strives to impart every necessary skill amongst its pupils.

College_Summary: Shri Jairambhai Patel Institute of Business Management (SJPI), Gandhinagar formerly known as National Institute of Cooperative Management (NICP) was established in 1995. The institute offers an MBA program under various specializations. Admission to the SJPI Gandhinagar is done on the basis of the CMAT scores. In addition to this, the institute has a world class infrastructure, excellent learning environment, quality and all-round edification through its multifaceted teaching-learning methodology, dynamic placement support through its placement cell, etc. The placement cell has a record of providing 100%. The average package is offered at INR 4.5 LPA and the highest package is offered at 10 LPA.

College_Name: TN Rao College, Rajkot
College_Summary: TN Rao College, Rajkot was established in 1998 and is affiliated to Saurashtra University, Rajkot and approved by the Government of Gujarat. TN Rao college offers 5 Undergraduate and 2 Post-graduate programs. It offers B.Ed, BCA, B.Sc, BBA and  B.Com at the UG level and M.Ed and M.Sc at the PG level. Admission are currently ongoing for various programs.Interested students can visit the official website and apply for the same. The BBA and B.Com program offered by the college is only for girl candidates.

College_Summary: Narmada College of Computer Application is a private and self-financed college. It is affiliated to Veer Narmad South Gujarat University (VNSGU) and approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). It offers Master of Computer Applications (M.C.A.). The college has classrooms, tutorial room, conference room, library, and computer lab with modern teaching aids for boundless learning and development of programming skills of career conscious students. The college has retained well-qualified experienced faculty members supported by a team of programmers and technical personnel to conduct classes and laboratory sessions effectively.

The institute has strived over the years since its inception to carve a niche for themselves in the field of education in hotel management. With the best faculty for guidance, the students are exposed to the different areas of specialization and facilities are available to help improve their skills and overall development.

College_Name: Central University of Gujarat
College_Summary: The Central University of Gujarat is established by an Act of Parliament of India, No. 25 of 2009 called Central Universities Act (2009). Currently, the university has 11 Schools with 22 Centres along with one independent Centre and 66 programs of studies. CUG has been ranked 60th in India and 2nd top most University in Gujarat according to NIRF 2016 rankings and as per the latest NIRF 2020 Rankings of the Universities all over India, Central University is among the top 50.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Master of Library and Information Science [M.Lib.I.Sc]

College_Name: Gujarat Ayurved University
College_Summary: Gujarat Ayurved University is the first Ayurveda University in the world located in Jamnagar, Gujarat that aims to impart teaching, training and research in various specialities of Ayurveda. Gujarat Ayurved University was established in 1965 by an Act of the Gujarat State Government. The university has designed UG, PG, PhD, and Certificate courses in Ayurvedic Pharmaceutical Sciences, Ayurvedic Medicinal Plant Sciences and Yoga & Naturopathy. It is accredited with Grade “A” by NAAC and is recognized by UGC. It offers 32 different courses in the various streams of Yoga, Pharmacy, and Ayurveda at Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and PhD levels. It also offers basic introductory courses in Ayurveda. It acts as a nodal agency for the propagation of Ayurveda all over the world.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery

College_Name: NFSU
College_Summary: National Forensic Sciences University (NFSU) is a central university established in the year 2008 and situated in Gandhinagar at Gujarat. It was earlier known as Gujarat Forensic Sciences University (GFSU). The University has been approved by UGC and accredited with grade A by NAAC. There are three different institutions under the university which offer various courses under the discipline of forensic and sciences. The institution offers PG degree and certification courses in the relevant field. Selection of students across different courses will be based on the merit and entrance-based followed by an interview based on the opted course.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [B.Sc] + Master of Science [M.Sc] (Forensic Science)

College_Name: GTU Ahmedabad
College_Summary: Gujarat Technological University (GTU) Ahmedabad is a government university established by the Government of Gujarat in the year 2007. A total of 486 colleges are affiliated with Gujarat Technological University. GTU is approved by UGC, NBA & PCI. GTU is accredited with an NAAC A+ grade. The university has about 2,25,000 students enrolled in various UG, PG, Research, and Diploma courses. GTU has been ranked at 71st position in Pharmacy by NIRF for the year 2023. The university achieved 151st position in an overall ranking by NIRF Innovation Rankings 2023. GTU also offers admission to online courses. The university has achieved a 4-star rating by GSIRF.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Computer Applications [BCA] + Master of Computer Applications [MCA]

College_Name: HNGU
College_Summary: Hemchandracharya North Gujarat University (HNGU) is a government university in Patan, Gujarat, India. Established in 1986, the university is approved by the UGC and accredited with an ‘A’ grade by the NAAC. HNGU offers more than 100 courses at the UG, PG, and PhD levels through 19 departments and various affiliated colleges. BCA, B.Sc, B.Ed, B.Com, MBA, and MCA are flagship courses of the university. HNGU admissions to most of the courses are done on the basis of marks secured in the qualifying examination

College_Name: KSKVKU
College_Summary: Krantiguru Shyamji Krishna Verma Kachchh University is a state university featured among Top Universities in Gujarat. The university is popularly known for its undergraduate, postgraduate and research level programs in various streams such as Arts, Science, Commerce and Management, Law, Medicine etc. The admissions to all courses except research level courses is merit based. The university does not conduct any separate entrance test for admissions to its courses.

Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications [PGDCA]

College_Name: Kadi Sarva Vishwavidyalaya Gandhi Nagar
College_Summary: The Kadi Sarva Vishwavidyalaya (KSV) University was established in 2007. The University has 19 Constituent Colleges and Departments at Gandhinagar and Kadi. University provides undergraduates, post-graduates courses, and Ph.D. courses in the field of Science, Commerce, Humanities, Education, Business, Nursing, and many more subjects.

College_Name: Raksha Shakti University
College_Summary: Rashtriya Raksha University, situated in Dahegam, Gandhinagar was established in 2009 and has 15 constituent schools. The university was established by the Government  of Gujarat and is recognised by UGC.

Courses_Details.Course Rating: 1 Reviews

College_Name: Saurashtra University
College_Summary: Saurashtra University is a government university in Rajkot, Gujarat. Established in 1967, the university is recognised by the UGC and accredited with an ‘A’ grade by the NAAC. The campus of Saurashtra University is spread across 363 acres of land and has 29 departments. Saurashtra University offers UG, PG, and PhD programs in various disciplines on its campus and 238 affiliated colleges. Admissions at Saurashtra University are based on merit or entrance examination conducted by the university. The university also accepts national-level tests such as CMAT scores for admission to the MBA program.

Courses_Details.Course Rating: 2 Reviews

College_Name: Shree Somnath Sanskrit University - [SSSU], Junagadh
College_Summary: Shree Somnath Sanskrit University was established in the year 2005 by Panditji Shri Naval Kishore Sharma former Governor and Chancellor of the University. It is recognized by University Grants Commission (UGC). It is located at Somnath-Verawal, dist-Junagadh, Gujarat. It is built over more than 17 acres of land donated by Shri Somnath Trust.

College_Name: VNSGU
College_Summary: Veer Narmad South Gujarat University (VNSGU) is a semi-urban university, located in Surat, Gujrat. The university has been accredited by NAAC with a ‘B++’ grade. The university has 34 Government, 60 Grant-in-aid, and 285 Self-financed Colleges, and 100 Post-graduate Teaching Centres attached to affiliated colleges.

College_Name: LJ Polytechnic - [LJP], Ahmedabad
College_Summary: LJ Polytechnic, Ahmedabad was founded in 2008 under the aegis of Lok Jagruti Kendra (LJK). The polytechnic institute provides 100% placement assistance to its students through mock aptitude tests, mock interviews, lectures by Industry experts, Industry visits and various other techniques. Many well known corporates such as IBM, Toyota, Tata and Suzuki have visited the campus for recruitment. LJP offers a Diploma program in the discipline of Engineering. Admission is done as per the guidelines of ACPDC.

College_Name: Swami Sachchidanand Polytechnic College - [SSPC], Visnagar
College_Summary: Swami Sachchidanand Polytechnic College (SSPC), Mehsana is approved by AICTE and affiliated with Sankalchand Patel University, Mehsana. Swami Sachchidanand Polytechnic College offers a diploma course in the discipline of Civil Engineering, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering and many more.
